felon.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who is guilty of a serious crime
felon.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: By law, convicted felons (=criminals who are sent to prison) may not own or use guns.
felon.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: someone who is guilty of a felony
felon.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The aim of the bill was to stop the sale of firearms to convicted felons.
